name: The Bugs of Zone XX
startIntroPart1: You, your office, and your alliance of sentient bug monsters mamage to slip into a fragmented world where many others collide.
startIntroPart2: However, for the Rats, business continues as usual as you find a way to go back from whence you came
declaringWar: You stand in the way of my people. Let us solve this like warriors!
attacked: You dare have the courage to challenge nod, but no fear, for I will sweep you out of history.
defeated: You have the guts to call my body a corpse but beware, I know what will happen to our future- our tiberium future.
introduction: If I am cut, Do I not bleed?
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, but we hope you take this rare opportunity we give you.
uniques: Comment [You have access to a unique resource, Flesh]
Comment [You can create unique basic units by offering flesh to the hive]
Comment [You get a unique evolving unit, 'Nightingale' at the start of the game]
Comment [You can open a rift in dimensions to call on your officers]

name: Kratyr
startIntroPart1: In a fit of rage you erase the entirety of existence.
startIntroPart2: Now in this new fragmented world you wish to atone for your mistakes and hopefully revive your divine siblings
declaringWar: It is in  my Intentions to spread the word of Nod into your land.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: I see for the black hand has been unworthy to serve Kane.
introduction: If you would stay out of our way then you might live to tell your tale.
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.
uniques: Comment [You have access to a unique resource, Tala]
Comment [By building monuments and offering faith, you are able to revive your divine siblings]
Comment [You get a unique unit, 'Nil' at the start of the game]
